entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 60%

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Showers beginning late in the afternoon.
